mapper.sql: id, method, operateor, operateType, operateDate, operateResult, remark
mapper.insert: insert into logtable (id, method, operateor, operateType, operateDate, operateResult, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

remark,

mapper.update:
update logtable
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operateor = #{operateor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operateType = #{operatetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operateDate = #{operatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operateResult = #{operateresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
